channel.title: admin on David Broska
channel.description: Recent content in admin on David Broska

item.description: I joined Zeppelin University as research fellow in methodology where I am currently involved in teaching and the development of learning resources. Before this, I received my master’s degree from the London School of Economics where I was awarded the Prize for the Best Overall Performance in the MSc Social Research Methods. I also worked as a data analyst in private companies and as a trainee at EUROSTAT, the statistical office of the European Commission.
